item.description: Hiker Rescue; INC#0432; 08:11AM; 136 Griffith Park; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qE7dHP; #GriffithPark; Firefighters located a 19-year-old female with a suspected leg fracture on or near a trail in the Griffith Park area. LAFD Air Operations performed a hoist operation and transported her to an area hospital by air. Nothing further.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E56 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA35 RA56 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1265; 06:25PM; 5900 N Topanga Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YHcNJA; #WoodlandHills; A significant collision between three vehicles, which deployed air bags in all three, resulted in 6 patients being transported to the hospital (1 in critical condition, 1 in moderate condition, and 4 in fair condition). Unknown age/gender/affiliation/circumstances. LAPD Inc #3123. Nothing further.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E84 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA105 RA106 RA72 RA84 RA878 RA891; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 02/11/2023 INC#1153

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1153; 05:53PM; 1068 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YH9su2; #DowntownLA; **Corrected Address** The first 66 LAFD firefighters to arrive found a 400' x 40' structure (approximately 16,000 sq-ft) with fire inside, the majority of which was isolated to a mezzanine. It took 24 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E17 E2 E202 E203 E210 E211 E215 E220 E26 E4 E5 E9 EA1 EA2 EM1 EM11 EM13 EM14 HR3 RA10 RA209 RA803 RA809 RA810 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1153; 05:29PM; 1057 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Yl82p8; #DowntownLA; One-story row of commercials, with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E210 E9 RA209 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Auto vs Aircraft (Low-Speed); INC#1754; 09:59PM; 825 LAX x TXWY C; MAP: https://bit.ly/40O0mNF; #Westchester; An airfield shuttle bus was involved in a low-speed collision with an aircraft being towed on the ground, resulting in 5 patients receiving LAFD EMS care and 4 being transported by LAFD ambulance to nearby hospitals. The tug driver was transported in moderate condition, the bus driver and two passengers were transported in fair condition, and the sole person aboard the plane (worker) was treated, but declined transport. No further information. Direct any additional inquiries to LAX Media Relations.; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AF2 BC4 E295 E51 EM13 EM9 RA5 RA51 RA867 RA95 S80 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1324; 06:01PM; 14830 W Pacific Coast Hw; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lteo7t; #PacificPalisades; LAFD and Santa Monica Firefighters mounted an attack by ground and air on the burning brush in steep terrain. It took 49 LAFD firefighters 50 minutes to snuff out the flames, holding the burn to approximately 1.5 acres. Crews will remain on scene to ensure any remaining hot spots are eliminated. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC18 BC9 BP23 CM40 CM42 E19 E23 E269 E290 E37 E59 E63 E69 E84 E90 EM4 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA23 RA69 T69 T90; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1324; 05:11PM; 14830 W Pacific Coast Hw; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lteo7t; #PacificPalisades; PRELIM: Approximately one-quarter-acre of brush burning uphill, with light wind. Currently, no structures threatened.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC9 E19 E23 E269 E37 E59 E63 E69 E90 EM4 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 T69; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0296; 07:19AM; 10211 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YpoKUy; #Northridge; It took 47 firefighters 44 minutes to extinguish flames inside of a two-story commercial building (day spa). One approximately 60-year-old female was transported due to smoke inhalation. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AR1 AR17 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E239 E275 E287 E289 E298 E39 E70 E75 E87 E88 E93 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA18 RA87 RA889 T39 T75 T87 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0296; 06:35AM; 10211 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YpoKUy; #Northridge; Two-story commercial building with moderate smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E275 E287 E70 E87 RA87 T75 T87; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0950; 02:44PM; 1023 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ifp8zj; #EastHollywood; *Corrected Address* 75 LAFD Firefighters took just 63 minutes of well-coordinated defensive firefighting operations to extinguish heavy fire that destroyed a vacant, boarded two-story Craftsman-style home, the site of a previous fire, that was well involved with flames on their arrival. Firefighters were able to limit fire damage to an occupied one-story home to the north, that despite intense flames, suffered only superficial fire damage. No injury. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E20 E203 E211 E220 E227 E26 E261 E27 E52 E6 EA1 EM5 HE2 RA35 RA52 RA803 T11 T20 T27 T3 T61 UR3; CH7; 14 15; Brian Humphrey
